name: DeIns
headerTaglineThree: We ensure Protection and Security on Web3

services.title: Financial Security
services.description: As we all know Hacks and technical failures are affecting many projects and its users We provide financial security to projects that are build on blockchain technology.

services.title: Scams
services.description: Web3 space is filled with scams that are leading into massive losses for people who are getting into it. We provide a safer environment by securing the best projects and educating people.

services.title: DEX Pools
services.description: Creating a pool of various assets and spreading the risk along the community so that it wont affect anyone, with a proper reward system we ensure benefits for everyone.

services.title: DAO
services.description: We work as a Decentralized Autonomous Organization for governance and for including everyone to take their part as a community.

services.title: Oracle
services.description: Providing an Native Oracle system for data oriented to security and financial markets along with taking maximum information from other providers also.

services.title: Connecting Traditional Systems
services.description: Traditional institutions and other service providers can take part in our system and can provide their services also.

services.title: Specialized and Experienced Team
services.description: Working with the industry best security, Audits, Finance and Management teams for efficient working of the system.

services.title: Security Team
services.description: Connecting with all the leading security teams thus creating a network of experts and security services for both the projects and users..

aboutpara: We promise financial security to valuable Projects by making them stake tokens into our pools, So basically risk is spread along the community. According to law of large number in insurance as the number of policies and pool size increases stability can be obtained in the protocol. Professional teams will evaluate the projects and its risks for generating a policy contract considering the market value of the project. The assets staked will be a part of large pool where profitable investment opportunities are found and a part of them are invested in them. Users can swap their tokens through our DEX and earn rewards.
